original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa🔽Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)🔽15.11. Hetuduka, Sekkhattika🔽Hetuṁ sekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nasekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.🔽Hetuṁ asekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naasekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa  dhamma anuloma paccanīya  hetu duka sekkhattika  hetum sekkham dhammam paṭicca na hetu na sekkhaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi  hetum asekkham dhammam paṭicca na hetu na asekkhaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nahetuṁ nevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nanahetu nanevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na hetum nevasekkha nāsekkham dhammam paccayā na na hetu na nevasekkha nāsekkhaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
